channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Anthropic’s Claude Opus 4.5 is here: Cheaper AI, infinite chats, and coding skills that beat humans
item.description: Anthropic released its most capable artificial intelligence model yet on Monday, slashing prices by roughly two-thirds while claiming state-of-the-art performance on software engineering tasks — a strategic move that intensifies the AI startup's competition with deep-pocketed rivals OpenAI and Google.The new model, Claude Opus 4.5, scored higher on Anthropic's most challenging internal engineering assessment than any human job candidate in the company's history, according to materials reviewed by VentureBeat. The result underscores both the rapidly advancing capabilities of AI systems and grow...

item.title: Signal’s secure message backups arrive on iOS
item.description: Signal is launching secure backups on iOS, allowing you to save and restore your messages in case you lose or break your phone. With the free version of the feature, you can store up to 100MB of text messages, along with the past 45 days’ worth of photos, videos, GIFs, and files. There’s also a […]

item.title: Rad Power Bikes’ batteries are a fire risk and shouldn’t be used, CPSC warns
item.description: The US Consumer Protection Safety Commission issued a stark warning about Rad Power Bikes’ e-bike batteries Monday, linking them to dozens of fires and saying they “pose a risk of serious injury and death.” The batteries can “unexpectedly ignite and explode,” especially when water or debris leaks in to cells or the harness, the agency […]

item.title: Hands on with Stickerbox, the AI-powered sticker maker for kids
item.description: Stickerbox turns kids’ ideas into printable stickers, blending AI magic with hands-on coloring for a surprisingly creative, "screen-light" play experience.

item.title: You Shouldn’t Expect a Cheap Steam Machine
item.description: Everything Valve has said paints the Steam Machine as a PC.

item.title: HP Black Friday laptop sales are here: huge discounts on work, creative and AI powered portables
item.description: HP's Black Friday laptop deals are live, giving you the chance to grab a work, home, or AI powered portable for less.

item.title: Anthropic’s new model is its latest frontier in the AI agent battle — but it’s still facing cybersecurity concerns
item.description: The AI labs never sleep — especially the week before Thanksgiving, it seems. Days after Google’s buzzworthy Gemini 3, and OpenAI’s updated agentic coding model, Anthropic has announced Claude Opus 4.5, which it bills as “the best model in the world for coding, agents, and computer use,” claiming it has leapfrogged even Gemini 3 in […]

item.title: I’m a trained TV calibrator, and these are the best budget big-screen TVs this Black Friday
item.description: Amazon's Black Friday deals bring these already high-value mini-LED TVs to an even lower price point.

A glass screen protector is one of a few essential accessories that every Switch 2 owner should make, along with a select few others. […]

item.description: The HBO show's creators talked about what to expect next as the story digs deeper into the origins of Stephen King's villainous clown.

You could try dropping subtle hints or asking friends and family for suggestions, but they might save their best ideas for […]

item.title: The Steam Deck LCD is 20 percent off for Black Friday

But for those who are shopping for someone who wants a fantastic gaming handheld for the holidays, the Steam Deck LCD with 256GB of storage is $319.20 — 20 percent […]

item.title: Trump-Xi call covered trade, Taiwan, Ukraine, soybeans, fentanyl, and more
item.description: After the call, Trump announced that he accepted Xi’s invitation to visit Beijing in April. President Donald Trump said he has accepted an invitation from Chinese leader Xi Jinping to visit Beijing in April and that he reciprocated by inviting Xi for a state visit to the U.S. later next year.

item.title: Black Friday shopping scams are on the rise - experts warn many new domains could be dodgy, here's what to look for
item.description: Be careful with sites having 'Black Friday' in their domain name, as well as those with 'Amazon' or 'Alibaba', say experts.

item.title: Arrêtez d’acheter des manettes bas de gamme : l’officielle Xbox est bradée pour le Black Friday
item.description: C'est le "standard d'or" du jeu vidéo. Que vous soyez sur PC, sur console ou même sur votre smartphone, la manette Xbox est la référence absolue. Bonne nouvelle : Boulanger a décidé de casser son prix. À moins de 40 euros, c'est le moment de remplacer celle qui a le stick qui dérive.

item.title: AWS is spending $50B build AI infrastructure for the US government
item.description: AWS has been working with the U.S. government since 2011 and is now building AI infrastructure specifically for the entity.

item.title: Get the excellent Google Pixel 9a for its lowest-ever price in Amazon's Black Friday sale
item.description: Get an AI phone for less - grab this Google Pixel 9a Black Friday deal now.

item.title: Anthropic releases Opus 4.5 with new Chrome and Excel integrations
item.description: Anthropic has launched Opus 4.5, the latest version of its flagship model, with new integrations into Chrome and Excel.

item.title: Que se passerait-il si un minitrou noir du Big Bang traversait votre corps ?
item.description: Les trous noirs sont souvent perçus comme des ogres cosmiques pouvant avaler et déchirer des étoiles et des planètes quand ils contiennent au moins quelques masses solaires. La Voie lactée pourrait cependant être baignée dans un gaz de minitrous noirs bien plus légers et petits, produits pendant...

item.title: Roborock Saros 10R : -41 % pour le Black Friday, c’est la meilleure offre aspirateur robot du moment
item.description: Lors de notre test, on lui reprochait surtout son prix. À 1429 euros, le Saros 10R était excellent mais trop cher. Aujourd'hui, Amazon corrige le tir avec une réduction violente de -41 %. Pour un aspirateur laveur capable de franchir des seuils de 4 cm, c'est imbattable.

item.title: Macy’s Thanksgiving Day Parade: New balloons, musical acts—and of course, ‘KPop Demon Hunters’
item.description: Here’s what to expect from the Nov. 27 parade and how to watch it. Two things that made massive cultural splashes this year — Labubu and “KPop Demon Hunters” — will fill the sky and streets of New York when the Macy’s Thanksgiving Day Parade kicks off this year. Conan Gray and Lainey Wilson will bring the tunes.

item.title: A New ‘Fast X’ Report Dives Into Its Director Exit and Ending Changes
item.description: Justin Lin famously left the 'Fast and Furious' sequel days into its shoot and was later replaced by Louis Leterrier.

item.title: Black Friday : le Pixel 9a perd 200 € et devient le roi du milieu de gamme
item.description: C'est la règle non écrite chez Google : ne jamais acheter au lancement. Sorti il y a quelques mois à 549 euros, le Pixel 9a vient de toucher son "vrai" prix pour le Black Friday. À 359 euros, ce smartphone au design radical change complètement de catégorie. C'est simple : il n'a plus aucun concurrent crédible.

item.title: Dust Bunny actor says it's about more than the monsters under the bed – it's about the world trying to convince us that we're alone
item.description: A. conversation with the multi-talented David Dastmalchian

item.title: With new Opus 4.5 model, Anthropic’s Claude could remain the best AI coding tool
item.description: Claude Code is already widely used by developers, and with a new brain, it may fend off Google’s new Antigravity tool. Anthropic launched its newest model, Claude Opus 4.5, putting the company back atop the benchmark rankings for AI software coding. Opus 4.5 scores over 80% on the widely-used SWE-bench, which tests models for software engineering skill. Google’s impressive Gemini 3 Pro, launched last week, briefly held the top score with 76.2%. Anthropic’s Claude product lead Scott White tells Fast Company that the model has also scored higher than any human on the engineering take-home assign...

item.title: What to know about the new Kohl’s CEO: Michael Bender takes over after leadership drama, ahead of earnings
item.description: Current interim CEO Bender will become the ailing retailer’s third chief executive in three years, with the company set to report third-quarter results Tuesday. Kohl’s announced on Monday that interim CEO Michael Bender will become the ailing retailer’s permanent new CEO—making him the third chief executive to head the company in about three years.

item.title: Les cartes graphiques AMD vont bientôt coûter beaucoup plus cher
item.description: Si vous aviez en tête d'offrir à votre PC une belle carte graphique toute neuve pour Noël, ne tardez pas à l'acheter rapidement. Tout laisse en effet penser que les prix de ces composants vont flamber dans les prochaines semaines. AMD prévoirait une hausse de 10 %… au moins.

item.title: DOGE is dead, but the damage is still with us. Here’s a look back at some of its most egregious moves
item.description: Elon Musk’s task force may have met an untimely end, but its brief blitz on federal systems will likely have ripple effects for years to come. It’s official: DOGE, the Trump administration’s “Department of Government Efficiency,” has met an early end.

item.title: X-energy rides nuclear wave, raises $700M Series D
item.description: The small modular reactor startup is capitalizing on surging interest from tech companies and data center developers.

item.title: This Panasonic soundbar is on sale for less than £50 for Black Friday – yes, really
item.description: This cheap Panasonic soundbar just got a whole lot cheaper thanks to this unbelievable Black Friday deal.

item.title: U.S. stocks rise on another Alphabet rally
item.description: Several more tests lie ahead this week for the market, including federal data showing how bad inflation was at the wholesale level in September. The U.S. stock market is rising again on Monday, ahead of a week with shortened trading because of the Thanksgiving holiday.
